title: Google\Cloud\Run\V2\Volume
name: Volume
description:
Volume represents a named volume in a container.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.run.v2.Volume

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.secret
params.description: Secret represents a secret that should populate this volume. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/storage/volumes#secret

params.name: data.cloud_sql_instance
params.description: For Cloud SQL volumes, contains the specific instances that should be mounted. Visit https://cloud.google.com/sql/docs/mysql/connect-run for more information on how to connect Cloud SQL and Cloud Run.
